release.action: Basic report content management feature has been implemented.
Conditional formatting support has been implemented.
Data source and appearance settings can be configured by users.
PDF and Excel export now contains filter information.
Implement legacy JPivot report import feature in Pentaho plugin.
Block UI while Ajax request is being processed.
Make drag & drop operation on axis configuration view more consistent and responsive.
Change show parent to include all the ancestor members.
New Arquillian based integration tests for the UI project.
Fixed problems with ragged hierarchies.
Fixed problems with parent-child hierarchies.
Support Mondrian/XMLA backend.
Allow the ROW axis to appear before the COLUMN axis in a MDX query.
Fixed a problem with drag & drop reordering in the axis tree node.
Fixed level / measure selection problem when one of the axis is empty.
Fixed rendering problem with drill member/replace process when the show parent option is enabled.
Fixed a bug in the filter dialog which made it impossible to uncheck selected members.
Fixed occasional view expiration errors.
Fixed hierarchy aggregator to correctly handle calculated values.
Fixed a bug in count aggregator which wrongly includes other aggregated values.
Preserve hierarchy order in axis when an all member is removed.
Fixed a MDX parsing problem with ".Properties()".
Unable to parse MDX with member names containing ']]' escape.
Expression language support in MDX query.
Custom / long term serialization support for StateHolder API.
Implement visual total feature(based on render strategy API).
Use unique name instead of object itself when comparing between metadata elements.
Missing member aggregation at the last position of the hierarchy.
Allow multiple aggregators per position.
[UI/Plugin] Add internalization/localisation support.
[UI/Plugin] Brazilian Portuguese translation by IT4Biz and Professor Coruja Team.
[UI/Plugin] Add basic Selenium integration test cases.
Implemented PDF export feature.
Implemented Microsoft Excel export feature.
Upgrade to Olap4J 1.1.0.
New public MDX parser API.
New convenient API for manipulating order of members in a hierarchy.
Improved slicer axis manipulation.
Basic member properties support.
Fixed a bug causing incorrect behavior in PlaceMembersOnAxes transform when axes are swapped.
Level members are now added to their respective parent hierarchies.
Fixed a bug causing incorrect level order in PlaceLevelsOnAxes.findVisibleLevels method.
Built-in drill down and sorting support in PivotRenderer(command API).
Major refactoring on the UI related API. Replaced the TableBuilder interface with a callback style PivotRenderer interface for flexibility.
Fixed a bug which made config parameters to be ignored in PooledOlapDataSource class.
Remove JDBC 4.0 API dependency to make it compile on Java 6.
Improved query transform API with more convenient methods.
Model state serialization code has been rewritten to fix a problem with PivotModel.restoreState().
Provide an easier way to implement sort headers.
Made TableBuilder API to generate missing level headers on row axis.
Fixed a bug in TableBuilder which generates incorrect table layout for non-contiguous level members.
Added the table builder API to facilliate UI implementation process.
Fixed the sorting problem.
Support for placing members on a non exisiting hierarchy.
Improve handling of an empty query axis.
Finished migration of major JPivot extensions as Transform API.
Added various data source implementations including PooledOlapDataSource.
